Row.Text: Use [ICON_PEACE] Faith to purchase Madrassas (+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for every 4 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in this City)
Madrassas
Madrassa
+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for every 4 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in this City

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Source: Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madrasa)[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Madrasa is the Arabic word for any type of educational institution, whether secular or religious (of any religion). The word is variously transliterated madrasah, medresa, madrassa, madraza, medrese, etc. In the West, the word usually refers to a specific type of religious school or college for the study of the Islamic religion, though this may not be the only subject studied. In countries like India, not all students in madrasas are Muslims; there is also a modern curriculum.
Can only be built in cities following a religion with the Madrassas belief. Construct this building by purchasing it with [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Use [ICON_PEACE] Faith to purchase Madrassas (+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith, +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for every 4 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in this City)
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Madrassas
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Madrassa
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science for every 4 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in this City
